item.description:
Level 2 - Open to sea kayaks and rec kayaks with bulkheads

Click picture on right for an ariel view of launch site

Come join us for a leisurely paddle up the lazy York River from York Harbor up to Scottland Bridge approx. 9miles round trip. High Tide is approx. 3:30 so we'll ride the Flood in and return on the Ebb. Parking along the road at the Town dock is limited but you can park across the Bridge at the wiggley bridge lot.

Rain Date will be Sunday starting at 1:30 pm

We'll stop for a snack along the route and maybe swim at Scottland Bridge if it's nice. Pack a snack/lunch as well as water. After the paddle we'll stop somewhere for a PPPO "Post Paddle Pig Out" so bring some doe.

See the link below for directions from Portsmouth avoiding the Maine Turnpike Tolls
York Harbor Town Dock #2
item.how_to_find_us: Look for kayakers - parking is limited
item.name: NE Seacoast Paddlers - York River Paddle
